issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Reproducer*

{code:sql}
set hive.metastore.try.direct.sql=false;
CREATE TABLE numericDataType(a TINYINT, b SMALLINT NOT NULL ENABLE, c INT,
 d BIGINT , e DOUBLE , f DECIMAL(9,2));
INSERT INTO numericDataType values(2,45,5667,67890,5.6,678.5);

ALTER TABLE numericDataType ADD CONSTRAINT uk1 UNIQUE(a,b) DISABLE NOVALIDATE;
DESC FORMATTED numericDataType;
{code}

*Error*
{code:sql}
FAILED: Execution Error, return code 1 from org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.DDLTask. java.lang.NullPointerException
{code}

*Error Stack*

fields.summary: Alter table add constraint unique fails with direct sql set to false
